title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 512.3 - Payment to pharmacies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 512.3 - Payment to pharmacies

State Regulations

Failure to follow the procedures set forth in section
512.2
of this Part will result in
denial of MA payment for those claims for which the procedures were not
followed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
512.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
